title: Mark Carney: An experienced and pragmatic economist to succeed Trudeau (and take on Trump) | International | EL PAÍS English
snippet: The change at the head of the Liberal Party, staged this Sunday with a vote in which the economist and former governor of two central banks, Mark Carney, obtained 89.6% of support to succeed Prime Minister Justin Trudeau, was another great symbol. title: I quit Mark Carney’s cabinet. This is what I hope happens next
snippet: Steven Guilbeault is the Liberal member of Parliament for Laurier–Sainte-Marie. He previously served as the minister of Canadian identity and culture under Mark Carney.

title: Who is Liberal leader Mark Carney, Canada's new prime minister?
snippet: The former Bank of England boss, Mark Carney, has won Canada's election to become the country's next prime minister.

title: Mark Carney to become Canada’s new Prime Minister : NPR
snippet: Mark Carney to become Canada’s new Prime Minister Carney, 59, will succeed Justin Trudeau, who announced in January that he would step down amid low approval ratings following a decade in office.
